aries.name: Aries
aries.communicationStyle: screaming their point louder until you agree
aries.jealousyTrigger: you liked someone's Instagram post from 2019
aries.argumentWeapon: bringing up that ONE thing from three years ago
aries.breakupMethod: changing their relationship status before telling you
aries.apologyStyle: saying 'sorry you feel that way' and meaning it
aries.redFlag: has already named your future children on the second date
aries.toxicTrait: thinking every disagreement is a personal attack
aries.restaurantBehavior: picking the restaurant, hating it, blaming you
aries.longTermOutlook: will either marry you in Vegas or ghost you by Thursday
aries.socialMediaHabit: posting cryptic quotes about loyalty after every argument
aries.sleepHabit: stealing all the blankets and denying it violently
aries.friendGroupRole: the one who starts drama then grabs popcorn

taurus.name: Taurus
taurus.communicationStyle: giving you the silent treatment for 11 business days
taurus.jealousyTrigger: you mentioned an ex's cooking was good
taurus.argumentWeapon: weaponized silence that could cut glass
taurus.textStyle: leaving you on read for 6 hours then sending 'k'
taurus.breakupMethod: slowly removing their stuff over 8 months until you notice
taurus.loveLanguage: buying expensive gifts and holding them over your head
taurus.apologyStyle: cooking you dinner but never actually saying sorry
taurus.redFlag: has a detailed spreadsheet of everything they've ever done for you
taurus.petPeeve: being rushed in any capacity whatsoever
taurus.toxicTrait: refusing to admit they're wrong until the heat death of the universe
taurus.restaurantBehavior: ordering the most expensive thing and judging your choice
taurus.longTermOutlook: will build a beautiful life together or hold a grudge until the sun explodes
taurus.socialMediaHabit: posting luxury purchases with 'treat yourself' captions after fights
taurus.sleepHabit: building a pillow fortress and growling if you cross the border
taurus.friendGroupRole: the one who remembers every slight from 2016

gemini.name: Gemini
gemini.communicationStyle: talking in circles until you forget what the argument was about
gemini.jealousyTrigger: you had a conversation with literally anyone
gemini.argumentWeapon: rewriting history so convincingly you question your own memory
gemini.textStyle: sending 47 messages about nothing then disappearing for a week
gemini.breakupMethod: texting 'we need to talk' then starting a completely different conversation
gemini.loveLanguage: love-bombing you with attention then vanishing into thin air
gemini.apologyStyle: apologizing so charmingly you end up apologizing to them
gemini.redFlag: has three different personalities and you've only met two
gemini.toxicTrait: flirting with everyone and calling it 'being friendly'
gemini.restaurantBehavior: changing their order four times then eating off your plate
gemini.longTermOutlook: will keep you entertained forever or gaslight you into another dimension
gemini.socialMediaHabit: subtweeting you in real-time during arguments
gemini.sleepHabit: talking in their sleep and revealing concerning information
gemini.friendGroupRole: the one who accidentally tells everyone's secrets

cancer.name: Cancer
cancer.communicationStyle: crying mid-sentence to win the argument
cancer.jealousyTrigger: you didn't text back within 4 minutes
cancer.argumentWeapon: emotional guilt trips that could win an Oscar
cancer.textStyle: sending 'I'm fine' followed by 14 paragraphs about why they're not fine
cancer.breakupMethod: writing a 3-page letter, burning it, then calling you sobbing at midnight
cancer.loveLanguage: memorizing your childhood trauma and using it to nurture (and manipulate) you
cancer.apologyStyle: crying harder than you until you comfort them instead
cancer.redFlag: has already imagined your breakup in vivid detail on the first date
cancer.petPeeve: being told they're overreacting (instant nuclear meltdown)
cancer.toxicTrait: keeping a mental scoreboard of emotional debts you owe them
cancer.restaurantBehavior: saying 'I don't care where we eat' then vetoing everything
cancer.longTermOutlook: will smother you with love until you can't breathe or cry themselves to sleep nightly
cancer.socialMediaHabit: posting throwback photos of you two during fights to guilt-trip publicly
cancer.sleepHabit: clinging to you like a koala and waking up offended if you moved
cancer.friendGroupRole: the one who cries at brunch about something that happened in 2014

leo.name: Leo
leo.communicationStyle: monologuing about their feelings while you sit in the audience
leo.jealousyTrigger: someone else got more attention than them at a party
leo.argumentWeapon: dramatically declaring the relationship is over every 48 hours
leo.textStyle: responding only with selfies and voice memos about themselves
leo.breakupMethod: making it a public spectacle with a social media announcement
leo.loveLanguage: requiring constant verbal affirmation that they are the best partner ever
leo.apologyStyle: apologizing with a grand gesture that's somehow still about them
leo.redFlag: refers to your relationship as 'their era'
leo.petPeeve: not being the center of attention at all times
leo.toxicTrait: believing the relationship revolves around their main character moment
leo.restaurantBehavior: flirting with the waiter to make you jealous then getting offended if you notice
leo.longTermOutlook: will build an empire together or burn it down for the aesthetic
leo.socialMediaHabit: posting couple content only when they look good in the photo
leo.sleepHabit: sleeping starfish-style in the exact center of the bed
leo.friendGroupRole: the one who somehow makes your crisis about them

virgo.name: Virgo
virgo.jealousyTrigger: you organized the dishwasher wrong and someone else might have taught you that
virgo.argumentWeapon: a mental PowerPoint presentation of everything you've ever done wrong
virgo.textStyle: proofreading every text three times and still finding a typo to stress about
virgo.breakupMethod: leaving a detailed pros/cons list on the kitchen counter
virgo.loveLanguage: reorganizing your entire life and being annoyed you didn't ask for it
virgo.apologyStyle: writing a formal apology email with bullet points and action items
virgo.redFlag: has already identified 47 things they'd change about you
virgo.petPeeve: inefficiency of any kind, especially emotional inefficiency
virgo.toxicTrait: criticizing you 'for your own good' every single day
virgo.restaurantBehavior: reading every review before choosing and still being disappointed
virgo.longTermOutlook: will optimize your relationship into perfection or optimize it into the ground
virgo.socialMediaHabit: drafting and deleting posts about you for 45 minutes then posting nothing
virgo.sleepHabit: setting 7 alarms and judging you for only setting one
virgo.friendGroupRole: the one who gives unsolicited advice disguised as concern

libra.name: Libra
libra.communicationStyle: agreeing with both sides until nobody knows where they stand
libra.jealousyTrigger: you didn't include them in a group photo
libra.argumentWeapon: being so reasonable it makes you feel insane for being upset
libra.textStyle: taking 3 hours to craft the perfect 'casual' response
libra.breakupMethod: suggesting a 'break' that lasts approximately forever
libra.loveLanguage: curating a relationship aesthetic rather than having actual feelings
libra.apologyStyle: apologizing to everyone involved including people who weren't there
libra.redFlag: still texting three exes because 'we're just friends'
libra.petPeeve: having to make a decision without a 3-hour deliberation
libra.toxicTrait: keeping backup options 'just in case' while telling you that you're the one
libra.restaurantBehavior: spending 40 minutes on the menu then ordering what you got
libra.longTermOutlook: will create a beautiful partnership or keep you in relationship purgatory forever
libra.socialMediaHabit: posting perfectly curated couple photos while the relationship crumbles
libra.sleepHabit: needing the room at the exact right temperature or nobody sleeps
libra.friendGroupRole: the one who agrees with whoever spoke last

scorpio.name: Scorpio
scorpio.communicationStyle: staring into your soul until you confess things you didn't even do
scorpio.jealousyTrigger: you breathed in the general direction of another human
scorpio.argumentWeapon: that secret you told them in confidence two years ago
scorpio.textStyle: reading your messages instantly but replying hours later to establish dominance
scorpio.breakupMethod: blocking you on everything, moving to another city, and pretending you never existed
scorpio.loveLanguage: intense eye contact and knowing your passwords 'for safety'
scorpio.apologyStyle: never apologizing but somehow making you feel like they did
scorpio.redFlag: has already gone through your phone, your email, and your childhood diary
scorpio.toxicTrait: treating the relationship like a psychological thriller they're directing
scorpio.restaurantBehavior: ordering something mysterious and judging everything you reveal about yourself
scorpio.longTermOutlook: ride or die literally -- there is no casual option
scorpio.socialMediaHabit: having no social media presence so you can never figure out what they're doing
scorpio.sleepHabit: sleeping with one eye open and somehow knowing if you checked your phone
scorpio.friendGroupRole: the one who knows everyone's secrets and deploys them strategically

sagittarius.name: Sagittarius
sagittarius.communicationStyle: being brutally honest and calling it 'just keeping it real'
sagittarius.jealousyTrigger: you suggested staying in on a Friday night
sagittarius.argumentWeapon: booking a spontaneous solo trip mid-fight
sagittarius.textStyle: sending you travel memes instead of responding to serious questions
sagittarius.breakupMethod: ghosting you from a different continent
sagittarius.loveLanguage: planning adventures together but forgetting to invite you
sagittarius.apologyStyle: saying 'my bad' and genuinely thinking that covers everything
sagittarius.redFlag: has commitment issues wrapped in a motivational quote
sagittarius.petPeeve: any sentence that begins with 'we need to settle down'
sagittarius.toxicTrait: treating emotional availability like it's a prison sentence
sagittarius.restaurantBehavior: insisting on a place nobody's heard of and pretending the food poisoning was worth it
sagittarius.longTermOutlook: will either be your greatest adventure or disappear into the sunset without you
sagittarius.socialMediaHabit: posting travel content that makes your relationship look like a tourism ad
sagittarius.sleepHabit: falling asleep anywhere except the actual bed
sagittarius.friendGroupRole: the one who moved to Bali and forgot to tell anyone

capricorn.name: Capricorn
capricorn.communicationStyle: scheduling a meeting to discuss your feelings during business hours
capricorn.jealousyTrigger: you complimented someone else's career achievements
capricorn.argumentWeapon: presenting a cost-benefit analysis of why they're right
capricorn.textStyle: responding with 'per my last text' energy
capricorn.breakupMethod: sending a formal dissolution email with a 30-day transition plan
capricorn.loveLanguage: adding you to their 5-year plan and expecting quarterly reviews
capricorn.apologyStyle: acknowledging the issue and creating an action plan but never saying 'sorry'
capricorn.redFlag: judges your credit score before your personality
capricorn.petPeeve: people who don't have a retirement plan at 25
capricorn.toxicTrait: treating the relationship like a startup they need to optimize
capricorn.restaurantBehavior: checking the prices before the menu and calculating the tip before ordering
capricorn.longTermOutlook: will build a stable empire or schedule you out of their life via calendar invite
capricorn.socialMediaHabit: only posting LinkedIn achievements and calling it 'content creation'
capricorn.sleepHabit: going to bed at exactly 10pm and judging your Netflix habits
capricorn.friendGroupRole: the one who sends calendar invites for casual hangouts

aquarius.name: Aquarius
aquarius.communicationStyle: explaining why emotions are a social construct while you cry
aquarius.jealousyTrigger: you understood a concept before they could explain it to you
aquarius.argumentWeapon: detaching emotionally and analyzing the fight from a 'sociological perspective'
aquarius.textStyle: sending you a 4-paragraph essay on humanity instead of saying 'I miss you'
aquarius.breakupMethod: explaining that monogamy is an outdated institution, then ghosting
aquarius.loveLanguage: sharing a documentary and calling it quality time
aquarius.apologyStyle: apologizing for 'society's expectations' rather than their own behavior
aquarius.redFlag: considers themselves too evolved for jealousy while being passively jealous
aquarius.toxicTrait: acting emotionally unavailable and calling it 'independence'
aquarius.restaurantBehavior: insisting on a vegan place nobody wants to go to because 'it's the future'
aquarius.longTermOutlook: will either revolutionize love itself or forget you exist while saving the world
aquarius.socialMediaHabit: posting conspiracy threads and calling it 'raising awareness'
aquarius.sleepHabit: staying up until 4am reading about quantum physics and waking you to share fun facts
aquarius.friendGroupRole: the one who disappeared for 3 months and came back with a new ideology

pisces.name: Pisces
pisces.communicationStyle: communicating exclusively through song lyrics and vibes
pisces.jealousyTrigger: you didn't intuitively know they were upset without them telling you
pisces.argumentWeapon: manifesting the worst-case scenario and then acting like it already happened
pisces.textStyle: sending you poetry at 3am and being devastated if you respond with 'lol nice'
pisces.breakupMethod: writing a song about you, releasing it, and hoping you figure it out
pisces.loveLanguage: creating an elaborate fantasy version of your relationship that doesn't match reality
pisces.apologyStyle: writing a heartfelt poem that's beautiful but doesn't actually address the issue
pisces.redFlag: has already written a sad song about your future breakup
pisces.toxicTrait: living in a fantasy world and getting upset when reality doesn't match
pisces.restaurantBehavior: ordering based on the 'energy' of the dish and crying if it's bad
pisces.longTermOutlook: will either be your soulmate or drown you both in feelings
pisces.socialMediaHabit: posting sunset photos with captions that are clearly about you but denying it
pisces.sleepHabit: having vivid dreams about the relationship and holding you accountable for dream-you's actions
pisces.friendGroupRole: the one who cries at every gathering and somehow makes it beautiful
